casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

September, 1937.

(September 1, 1937.) Louise C. Gerry, 189 Audubon Drive, Snyder, Erie County, N. Y., Plaintiff, v. Otto W. Volger, as Commissioner of Jurors of Erie County, Defendant.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals granted. [See ante, p. 217.] Present —■ Sears, P. J., Edgeomb, Crosby, Lewis and Taylor, JJ.
